### Notice Type and Status
This is an *Advance Contract Award Notice* (ACAN) with a tender status of *Expired*.

### Tender Requirements
The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for the provision of annual ground and simulator training for Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Pilatus PC-12 NG and Twin Otter DHC-6 pilots. The training is in accordance with the Air Services Fixed Wing Operations Manual (FWOM) section 6. Transport Canada requires annual training to ensure pilots maintain a high level of safe competency.

### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria is based on the *Lowest Price*.

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
The regions of opportunity and delivery include the *United States of America* and *Canada*.

### Contracting Entity and End User
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with the end user being the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).
